public void Drawpotion_svg(Context cr, int x, int y, float width, float height, double[] rgba) {
	ImageSurface temp_surface;
	Context old_cr;
	Pattern pattern = null;
	Matrix matrix = cr.Matrix;
	
	cr.Save();
	float w = 512;
	float h = 512;
	float scale = Math.Min(width / w, height / h);
	matrix.Translate(x + Math.Max(0, (width - w * scale) / 2), y + Math.Max(0, (height - h * scale) / 2));
	matrix.Scale(scale, scale);
	cr.Matrix = matrix;

	cr.Operator = Operator.Over;
	pattern = new SolidPattern(rgba[0], rgba[1], rgba[2], rgba[3]);
	cr.SetSource(pattern);
	
	cr.NewPath();
	cr.MoveTo(257.949219, 17.128906);
	cr.CurveTo(238.628906, 203.128906, 218.796875, 22.863281, 208.488281, 33.5625);
	cr.LineTo(212.980469, 58.851563);
	cr.LineTo(194.144531, 71.851563);
	cr.LineTo(197.902344, 83.890625);
	cr.LineTo(210.742188, 125.058594);
	cr.CurveTo(212.207031, 156.402344, 202.117188, 181.507813, 186.914063, 205.054688);
	cr.CurveTo(168.058594, 234.253906, 140.925781, 260.199219, 119.253906, 289.011719);
	cr.CurveTo(107.691406, 304.378906, 103.484375, 322.289063, 105.96875, 339.582031);
	cr.CurveTo(108.445313, 356.871094, 117.289063, 373.472656, 130.761719, 387.839844);
	cr.CurveTo(157.707031, 416.574219, 203.386719, 436.882813, 259.105469, 436.492188);
	cr.CurveTo(311.921875, 436.125, 357.167969, 415.144531, 384.40625, 386.179688);
	cr.CurveTo(398.027344, 371.695313, 407.226563, 355.085938, 410.011719, 337.746094);
	cr.CurveTo(412.789063, 320.40625, 408.730469, 302.359375, 396.859375, 287.066406);
	cr.LineTo(396.855469, 287.066406);
	cr.CurveTo(374.726563, 258.554688, 347.132813, 232.992188, 327.769531, 204.058594);
	cr.CurveTo(311.867188, 180.296875, 301.257813, 154.851563, 302.660156, 122.683594);
	cr.LineTo(317.890625, 71.003906);
	cr.LineTo(300.289063, 83.003906);
	cr.LineTo(304.378906, 57.644531);
	cr.CurveTo(296.089844, 46.875, 277.269531, 41.695313, 257.945313, 41.878906);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(292.855469, 76.988281);
	cr.LineTo(286.273438, 99.324219);
	cr.CurveTo(263.769531, 109.996094, 244.996094, 109.1875, 226.496094, 716.324219);
	cr.LineTo(219.496094, 693.878906);
	cr.LineTo(292.855469, 693.371094);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(284.089844, 120.480469);
	cr.CurveTo(285.359375, 151.957031, 296.804688, 178.507813, 312.242188, 201.574219);
	cr.CurveTo(319.613281, 212.589844, 327.847656, 222.90625, 336.316406, 232.828125);
	cr.CurveTo(315.558594, 227.136719, 286.929688, 223.476563, 255.46875, 223.476563);
	cr.CurveTo(227.296875, 223.476563, 201.40625, 226.414063, 181.390625, 231.113281);
	cr.CurveTo(188.875, 221.933594, 196.101563, 212.40625, 202.613281, 202.320313);
	cr.CurveTo(217.566406, 179.164063, 228.515625, 152.625, 229.382813, 121.363281);
	cr.CurveTo(246.503906, 127.019531, 265.039063, 127.085938, 284.09375, 120.480469);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(359.671875, 259.234375);
	cr.CurveTo(363.945313, 264.019531, 368.152344, 268.777344, 372.1875, 273.519531);
	cr.CurveTo(364.914063, 278.25, 355.746094, 282.03125, 344.894531, 285.253906);
	cr.CurveTo(321.441406, 292.214844, 290.101563, 296.304688, 255.46875, 296.304688);
	cr.CurveTo(220.832031, 296.304688, 189.488281, 292.210938, 166.039063, 285.253906);
	cr.CurveTo(157.238281, 282.640625, 149.5625, 279.652344, 143.089844, 276.09375);
	cr.CurveTo(147.082031, 271.226563, 151.265625, 266.335938, 155.515625, 261.421875);
	cr.CurveTo(159.886719, 263.484375, 165.21875, 265.515625, 171.359375, 267.339844);
	cr.CurveTo(192.320313, 273.558594, 222.332031, 277.617188, 255.46875, 277.617188);
	cr.CurveTo(288.605469, 277.617188, 318.613281, 273.558594, 339.578125, 267.339844);
	cr.CurveTo(347.886719, 264.871094, 354.734375, 262.023438, 359.671875, 259.238281);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(102.039063, 364.234375);
	cr.CurveTo(51.886719, 377.863281, 19.488281, 398.046875, 19.488281, 420.4375);
	cr.CurveTo(19.488281, 461.453125, 126.011719, 494.789063, 257.1875, 494.789063);
	cr.CurveTo(388.359375, 494.789063, 494.882813, 461.453125, 494.882813, 420.4375);
	cr.CurveTo(494.882813, 398.128906, 462.761719, 377.859375, 412.917969, 364.234375);
	cr.CurveTo(430.148438, 373.113281, 440.4375, 383.484375, 440.4375, 394.679688);
	cr.CurveTo(440.4375, 426.808594, 358.125, 453.222656, 257.1875, 453.222656);
	cr.CurveTo(156.246094, 453.222656, 74.523438, 426.804688, 74.523438, 394.679688);
	cr.CurveTo(74.523438, 383.421875, 84.636719, 373.144531, 102.042969, 364.234375);
	cr.ClosePath();
	cr.MoveTo(102.039063, 364.234375);
	cr.Tolerance = 0.1;
	cr.Antialias = Antialias.Default;
	cr.FillRule = FillRule.Winding;
	cr.FillPreserve();
	if (pattern!= null) pattern.Dispose();

	cr.Restore();
}
